title: lolclient.exe has stop working
body: happens every time i log in wasnt happening yesterday.

replies.body: This is happening to me as well. go to buy some RP client crashes. go to look at champion skins. client crashes. Log in and try talk to a friend. client crashes lol

we have to fine someone responsibility or in charge that .

Lost Plat promos because of this cheers riot

This is happened to me 32 times this afternoon. I've tallied every single time, when I am in store and when I go into my profile.

I've rebooted a good 50 times aswell.

Common the one day I go to play.  The one day I got to buy things :/

This meant to be the biggest video game on the planet, these issues should not ship.
happening to me to. rito pls!

think i've narrowed it to down occurring when you re-enter shop after leaving shop to something else e.g. the main screen or summoner profile
or maybe its just me
edit: dang just happened in champ select for me :l
speculating this started happening to me after they added the new skins for ez, morde, syndra and shaco to shop

Exact thing is happening to me aswell, its really annoying, i've managed to play one bot game today but anything else is unmanageable. At first i thought it was my computer but its not. Can someone please help me to fix this problem {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{champion:32}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
I can play games if I am quick to get into them but if I idle at home screen I find I get the error

I want to buy some champs on the store, everytime i go to the store my client crashes and it says lol.exe has crashed. I just hope they pick up on this issue cause its affecting alot of people i think. {{summoner:3}}
